data.title: Fountain on the estate of film comedian Harold Lloyd and his wife Mildred, Beverly Hills, 1927
data.meta_description: Access to this collection is generously supported by Arcadia funds.Fountain on the sixteen-acre estate of film comedian Harold Lloyd and his wife, Mildred Harris Lloyd in Beverly Hills.
